item.title: Xbox PS2 Gamecube what's the best
item.dc:creator: @Dregen Dregen
item.description:
@Dregen wrote:

I personally like the PS2, I just absolutely LOVE the Ratchet and Clank games. I think it’s the best shooter game I’ve ever played (Yes, to me it even beats Halo) because the story is very good and very funny, and you can strafe and stuff. Halo is just ordinary shoot and kill but this game you have to dodge enemies when they shoot at you or w/e. Thoigh I have to admit that Ratchet: Deadlocked has too few weapons. I think they should’ve included the weapons from Ratchet: Going Commando (Has like 20 different weapons?! :eek:), that would’ve made it hella fun. This game would probably be approved by more parents too so thats a plus.

But of course I think the PS2 rules too because its the only one in the three that I own. I’m not rich like all of those other kids out there lol.

I hope I can get the PS3 when it comes out. Until that I’ll stick to my older consoles like I had always did, remember when I had a normal Game Boy and Game Boy Pocket which I had until I got my Game Boy Advance.

Read full topic
item.source: Xbox PS2 Gamecube what's the best

item.title: Xbox PS2 Gamecube what's the best
item.dc:creator: @ryefox2 ryefox2
item.description:
@ryefox2 wrote:

Jacko154:

Xbox 360 is ownage people are gonna get a big shock when they spend like 600 pound on one of these and get it home and realise that it is actually no better than 360 plus xbox live owns ps live

Wtf spam pl0x? You said they are going to get a big shock when they spend 600 pound on a xbox 360 just to take it home and realise its no better than the xbox 360 (mabye because it is an xbox 360, daa!!

And also remember that the xbox 360 or the ps3 was never an option in this threesom contest.

[quote=“rabcarl, post:18, topic:11689”]In this order:

  1. XBOX/360(nice that it has a hard drive plus the system itself can’t be beat, I have both)
  2. PS2 (close to the XBOX, but I don’t like it as much)
    I haven’t tried PS3 yet but I heard it is pretty good.[/quote]

Thats probably (I don’t know but just guessing) because its not out yet O.o?

Read full topic
